data.name: Merchant Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Congratulations! You are the owner of new shop and it's in a prime location. The kingdom now awaits to see what kind of entrepreneur you shall become. Many will offer you deals, only some of them will be worthy of acknowledgment. Choose wisely and your wealth shall amass, choose foolishly and you shall receive woe.

Featuring:

  • A colorful cast of characters from the sane and witty to the downright mad
  • Hire employees to help manage your shop
  • Dynamic barter system
  • Customize your shop to your liking
  • Slay would-be thieves
  • Multiple endings
  • Upgrade your shop for maximum profit
data.about_the_game:
Congratulations! You are the owner of new shop and it's in a prime location. The kingdom now awaits to see what kind of entrepreneur you shall become. Many will offer you deals, only some of them will be worthy of acknowledgment. Choose wisely and your wealth shall amass, choose foolishly and you shall receive woe.

Featuring:

  • A colorful cast of characters from the sane and witty to the downright mad
  • Hire employees to help manage your shop
  • Dynamic barter system
  • Customize your shop to your liking
  • Slay would-be thieves

data.short_description: Buy, sell and barter your way to the top! Hire new employees to help you run your shop and choose wisely with your trades. Will you aid your king and community or wring them dry?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 560X 4GB or Nvidia Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

content_descriptors.notes: Players can kill rats and other characters. Alcohol usage implied.
